item.title: Michelle add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "Here was peace. She pulled in her horizon like a great fish-net. Pulled it from around the waist of the world and draped it over her shoulder. So much of life in its meshes! She called in her soul to come and see." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Fiona Apple
item.description: "When the Pawn Hits the Conflicts He Thinks Like a King What He Knows Throws the Blows When He Goes to the Fight and He'll Win the Whole Thing 'Fore He Enters the Ring There's No Body to Batter When Your Mind Is Your Might So When You Go Solo, You Hold Your Own Hand and Remember That Depth Is the Greatest of Heights and If You Know Where You Stand, Then You Know Where to Land and If You Fall It Won't Matter, Cuz You'll Know That You're Right" -- Fiona Apple

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "We create the illusions we need to go on." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "There in the city's steam-and-smoke-smudged harbor is the most extraordinary sight of all: a great copper-clad lady with a torch in one hand and a book in the other. It is not a statesman or a god or a war hero who welcomes us to this new world. It is but an ordinary woman lighting the way- a lady offering us the liberty to pursue our dreams if we've the courage to begin." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "Let those who believe, believe. Let those who doubt, doubt." -- Lisa See

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
